Name: Lootmapper Use Permit: Roya Frostlands
AttributesDescription: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to the Lootmapper in given regions.
BgDescription: The use permit of the Lootmapper in Roya Frostlands. To ensure frequency safety in Roya Frostlands, users are permitted to use the Lootmapper only within authorized areas in compliance with this official permit.
ObtainedShowDescription: Grants the bearer of this permit the access to Casket Sonar in given regions.
AccessDescriptions: Reward for Sonance Casket collection in Rinascita
